InstructionData.Title: Horizontal_Vertical Solar Panel Control 1.1
InstructionData.Description:
This IC controls solar panel horizontal and vertical angle to always point at the sun. It's 99-100% efficient. The solar panels reset to face the rising sun after sunset.
[b]Setup[/b]
The daylight sensors [i]must[/i] be mounted face up, with the green sensor towards the sun. The power/data port of the horizontal sensor [i]must[/i] point at the setting sun (east).
The power port of the solar panel [i]must[/i] point north. It's recommended to spread out the solar panels so they don't block each other.
[b]​IC Housing Connections[/b] [list] [*]VDaySensor (D0): Daylight Sensor - Horizontal [*]HDaySensor (D1): Daylight Sensor - Vertical [*]VSetting (D3): Memory - Horizontal [*]HSetting (D4): Memory - Vertical [/list]
[b]​Data Connections[/b] [list] [*]Daylight Sensor - Horizontal => Circuit Housing [*]Daylight Sensor - Vertical => Circuit Housing [*]Circuit Housing => Memory - Horizontal [*]Circuit Housing => Memory - Vertical [*]Memory - Horizontal => Batch Writer - Horizontal [*]Memory - Vertical => Batch Writer - Vertical [/list]
